## nextPowerOf2() function

Given a number, find the next number power of 2.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function nextPowerOf2(value: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | The given number. |

**Returns:**

number

The next number power of 2.
